name: Avoid modification of lengths or types of Fields (PeopleSoft)
description: FIELDTYPE and LENGTH are compared with those defined in the Vanilla
output: Failed checks give the number of wrongly defined fields. The defined values in the vanilla and in the project can be found in the value column
rationale: Modification of length or type of Fields will impact each record and the display on each page that contains it. You have to do an impact analysis on the entire environment (PeopleCode, SQR, Crystal, ...).
remediation: Avoid as much as possible modification on Field and document them.
alternativeName: Avoid modification of lengths or types of Fields (PeopleSoft)

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
